issue.title: [CI] Add sccache to r jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18016](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18016). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Building on the work in ARROW-17021 we can now activate sccache on more builds and save more time! To keep the PRs reviewable I have reduced this to only R jobs and will open follow-ups for the other tasks.
